name: MetaLama
description: MetaLama is a play-to-earn BSC token with rewards for holders and automatic Liquidity Provision. We have a 10% buy and sell tax of which 2% are automatic Liquidity Provision, 3% go directly to holders, and 5% are for treasury. We recently launched and will be releasing a play to earn concept within a week and a full game within a couple of weeks. We also plan on doing additional projects such as more advanced games/metaverse applications in the future. Our smart contract was audited by Interfi and we completed KYC with PinkSale as well.
